title: English
content:
Teacher: Today we will learn how to form questions in English. In Chinese, we often just add a particle or change intonation, but English changes the word order.

Student: [Where are you going?|You are going where?] 
Teacher: Good. We move the auxiliary verb 'are' to the front.

Student: [Do you like this?|You like this?] 
Teacher: Yes. For regular verbs, we add 'Do' at the start.

Let's practice more:

1. [What is your name?|Your name is what?]
2. [Are you ready?|You are ready?]
3. [Does she speak English?|She speaks English?]
4. [Where does he live?|He lives where?]
5. [Can you help me?|You can help me?]
explanationZhTw:
英文疑問句需要調整語序。
1. Be動詞 (am, is, are) 或助動詞 (can, will) 要移到主詞前面。
   例如: You are ready. -> Are you ready?
2. 一般動詞疑問句需在句首加助動詞 Do/Does。
   例如: You like this. -> Do you like this?
3. 疑問詞 (Where, What, How) 永遠放在句首。
   例如: Where are you going?
explanationEnUs:
English questions require changing the word order.
1. Move the Be verb (am, is, are) or auxiliary verb (can, will) before the subject.
   e.g., You are ready. -> Are you ready?
2. For other verbs, use the auxiliary 'Do' or 'Does' at the beginning.
   e.g., You like this. -> Do you like this?
3. Question words (Where, What, How) always go at the very front.
   e.g., Where are you going?
explanationZhCn:
英文疑问句需要调整语序。
1. Be动词 (am, is, are) 或助动词 (can, will) 要移到主词前面。
   例如: You are ready. -> Are you ready?
2. 一般动词疑问句需在句首加助动词 Do/Does。
   例如: You like this. -> Do you like this?
3. 疑问词 (Where, What, How) 永遠放在句首。
   例如: Where are you going?

title: Student
content:
Teacher: Now let's try some longer questions.

Student: [When will you arrive?|You will arrive when?]
Teacher: 'Will' comes before 'you'.

Student: [Why did he leave early?|Why he left early?]
Teacher: Even with 'Why', we still need an auxiliary verb (did).

Practice:
1. [How have you been?|How you have been?]
2. [What were they doing?|They were doing what?]
3. [Should I call him?|I should call him?]
4. [Who are you waiting for?|You are waiting for who?]
explanationZhTw:
即使有疑問詞 (When, Why, How, What, Who)，助動詞依然要放在主詞前面。
例如: Why did he leave? (正確)
Why he left? (錯誤 - 缺少助動詞倒裝)
explanationEnUs:
Even with question words (When, Why, How, What, Who), the auxiliary verb must come before the subject.
e.g., Why did he leave? (Correct)
Why he left? (Incorrect - missing auxiliary inversion)
explanationZhCn:
即使有疑问词 (When, Why, How, What, Who)，助动词依然要放在主词前面。
例如: Why did he leave? (正确)
Why he left? (错誤 - 缺少助动词倒裝)

title: Early
content: [Do you wake up|You wake up] early? [Does she brush|She brushes] her teeth? [Do they eat|They eat] breakfast? [Does he drive|He drives] to work? [Do we start|We start] now?
explanationZhTw: Yes/No questions with regular verbs need Do/Does at the start.
explanationEnUs: Start with Do/Does for simple present questions.
explanationZhCn: Yes/No questions with regular verbs need Do/Does at the start.

title: Live?
content: [Where do you live?|Where you live?] [When does it start?|When it starts?] [What do you want?|What you want?] [Why does she cry?|Why she cries?] [How do we go?|How we go?]
explanationZhTw: Wh- words + Do/Does + Subject + Verb.
explanationZhCn: Wh- words + Do/Does + Subject + Verb.

title: School
content: [Did you go|You went] to school? [Did she see|She saw] the movie? [Did they play|They played] well? [Did he finish|He finished] his work? [Did it rain|It rained] yesterday?
explanationZhTw: Past questions use 'Did' + base verb.
explanationEnUs: Use 'Did' + base verb for past questions.
explanationZhCn: Past questions use 'Did' + base verb.

title: Wait
content: [Will you come|You will come] tomorrow? [Will it rain|It will rain] soon? [Will they win|They will win]? [Will she angry|Will she be angry]? (Wait, Will she be angry covers Be). [Will he go|He will go]?
explanationZhTw: Will + Subject + Verb. Don't forget 'be' if there's no action verb!
explanationZhCn: Will + Subject + Verb. Don't forget 'be' if there's no action verb!

title: Swim
content: [Can you swim|You can swim]? [Could he help|He could help]? [Can we go|We can go]? [Can she sing|She can sing]? [Could you open|You could open] the door?
explanationZhTw: Modal verbs (Can, Could) move to the front.
explanationZhCn: Modal verbs (Can, Could) move to the front.

title: Brother
content: [Is he|He is] your brother? [Are they|They are] here? [Is it|It is] cold? [Are we|We are] lost? [Am I|I am] right?
explanationZhTw: Be verbs (Is, Are, Am) move to the front.
explanationEnUs: Move Be verb to the front.
explanationZhCn: Be verbs (Is, Are, Am) move to the front.

title: Bag
content: [Where is|Where be] my bag? [Who is|Who be] that man? [What are|What be] those? [Why are|Why be] you sad? [How is|How be] your mom?
explanationZhTw: Wh- word + Is/Are + Subject.
explanationZhCn: Wh- word + Is/Are + Subject.

title: Doing?
content: [What are you doing?|What you are doing?] [Where is he going?|Where he is going?] [Why are they laughing?|Why they are laughing?] [Who is she talking to?|Who she is talking to?] [What is it eating?|What it is eating?]
explanationZhTw: Question word + Be verb + Subject + V-ing.
explanationZhCn: Question word + Be verb + Subject + V-ing.

title: Japan
content: [Have you seen|You have seen] this? [Has she eaten|She has eaten] yet? [Have they finished|They have finished]? [Has he been|He has been] to Japan? [Have we met|We have met]?
explanationZhTw: Present Perfect Questions: Have/Has + Subject + V3.
explanationZhCn: Present Perfect Questions: Have/Has + Subject + V3.

title: Like
content: [Don't you like|You don't like] pizza? [Doesn't she know|She doesn't know]? [Didn't you go|You didn't go]? [Aren't they happy|They aren't happy]? [Isn't it nice|It isn't nice]?
explanationZhTw: Negative questions start with Don't, Doesn't, Didn't, Isn't, Aren't.
explanationZhCn: Negative questions start with Don't, Doesn't, Didn't, Isn't, Aren't.

title: Happy
content: You are happy, [aren't you|are you]? She is nice, [isn't she|is she]? He can swim, [can't he|can he]? You like it, [don't you|do you]? They played well, [didn't they|did they]?
explanationZhTw: Positive sentence -> Negative tag.
explanationZhCn: Positive sentence -> Negative tag.

title: Want
content: [Who wants|Who does want] ice cream? [What happened|What did happen]? [Who broke|Who did break] the window? [Who lives|Who does live] here? [What fell|What did fall]?
explanationZhTw: Asking about the subject: No Do/Does/Did helper needed!
explanationZhCn: Asking about the subject: No Do/Does/Did helper needed!

title: Like
content: [Would you like|You would like] some tea? [May I have|I may have] a cookie? [Could you help|You could help] me? [Shall we go|We shall go]? [Can I ask|I can ask] a question?
explanationZhTw: Polite structures move Modal to front.
explanationEnUs: Modals moved to front for requests.
explanationZhCn: Polite structures move Modal to front.

title: Cat?
content:
1. [Where is the cat?|The cat is where?]
2. [Where are my keys?|My keys are where?]
3. [Where do you live?|You live where?]
explanationZhTw: 疑問詞 (Where) 放句首，接著是 Be動詞 (is/are) 或助動詞 (do)。
explanationEnUs: Question word (Where) comes first, followed by Be verb or Auxiliary.
explanationZhCn: 疑问词 (Where) 放句首，接着是 Be动词 (is/are) 或助动词 (do)。

title: Girl?
content:
1. [Who is that girl?|That girl is who?]
2. [Who are they?|They are who?]
3. [Who is calling?|Calling is who?]
explanationZhTw: Who 放句首。
explanationZhCn: Who 放句首。

title: You?
content:
1. [Is he taller than you?|He is taller than you?]
2. [Are they faster?|They are faster?]
3. [Is this better?|This is better?]
explanationZhTw: 把 Be動詞 (Is/Are) 移到句首形成疑問句。
explanationEnUs: Move Be verb (Is/Are) to the front.
explanationZhCn: 把 Be动词 (Is/Are) 移到句首形成疑问句。

title: Cream?
content:
1. [Do you like ice cream?|You like ice cream?]
2. [Do they play tennis?|They play tennis?]
3. [Do we have time?|We have time?]
explanationZhTw: 一般動詞需加助動詞 Do 放句首。
explanationEnUs: Use auxiliary 'Do' at the start for regular verbs.
explanationZhCn: 一般动词需加助动词 Do 放句首。

title: Way?
content:
1. [Does he know the way?|He knows the way?]
2. [Does she want water?|She wants water?]
3. [Does it work?|It works?]
explanationZhTw: 第三人稱單數 (He/She/It) 用 Does 放句首，動詞還原。
explanationEnUs: Use 'Does' for He/She/It; revert verb to base form.
explanationZhCn: 第三人称单数 (He/She/It) 用 Does 放句首，动词还圆。

title: Fly?
content:
1. [Can you fly?|You can fly?]
2. [Can she swim?|She can swim?]
3. [Can we go?|We can go?]
explanationZhTw: 助動詞 Can 移到句首。
explanationZhCn: 助动词 Can 移到句首。

title: Rain?
content:
1. [Will it rain?|It will rain?]
2. [Will you come?|You will come?]
3. [Will they win?|They will win?]
explanationZhTw: 助動詞 Will 移到句首。
explanationZhCn: 助动词 Will 移到句首。

title: Sad?
content:
1. [Why are you sad?|You are sad why?]
2. [Why is he late?|He is late why?]
3. [Why do birds fly?|Why birds fly?]
explanationZhTw: Why 放句首，接著倒裝 (are you, is he, do birds)。
explanationEnUs: Why comes first, followed by inversion.
explanationZhCn: Why 放句首，接着倒装 (are you, is he, do birds)。

title: It?
content:
1. [What time is it?|What time it is?]
2. [What time does it start?|What time it starts?]
3. [What time are we leaving?|What time we are leaving?]
explanationZhTw: What time 須配合倒裝 (is it, does it start, are we)。
explanationEnUs: What time requires inversion (is it, does it start, are we).
explanationZhCn: What time 须配合倒装 (is it, does it start, are we)。

title: There?
content:
1. [How many apples are there?|How many apples there are?]
2. [How many friends do you have?|How many friends you have?]
3. [How many days are left?|How many days left?]
explanationZhTw: How many + 名詞 + 助動詞/Be動詞 + 主詞。
explanationZhCn: How many + 名词 + 助动词/Be动词 + 主语。

title: That?
content:
1. [Did you see that?|You saw that?]
2. [Did he call?|He called?]
3. [Did we win?|We won?]
explanationZhTw: 過去式疑問句用 Did 放句首，動詞還原。
explanationEnUs: Past tense questions use 'Did' at start; verb reverts to base.
explanationZhCn: 过去式疑问句用 Did 放句首，动词还圆。

title: Home?
content:
1. [Were you home?|You were home?]
2. [Was she sick?|She was sick?]
3. [Were they happy?|They were happy?]
explanationZhTw: Be動詞過去式 (Was/Were) 移到句首。
explanationEnUs: Move past Be verbs (Was/Were) to front.
explanationZhCn: Be动词过去式 (Was/Were) 移到句首。

title: Finished?
content:
1. [Have you finished?|You have finished?]
2. [Has she run?|She has run?]
3. [Have they eaten?|They have eaten?]
explanationZhTw: 現在完成式 Have/Has 移到句首。
explanationEnUs: Move Have/Has to front for Present Perfect.
explanationZhCn: 现在完成式 Have/Has 移到句首。

title: Go?
content:
1. [Should we go?|We should go?]
2. [Should I stop?|I should stop?]
3. [Should he help?|He should help?]
explanationZhTw: 助動詞 Should 移到句首。
explanationZhCn: 助动词 Should 移到句首。

title: This?
content:
1. [Whose book is this?|Whose book this is?]
2. [Whose car is that?|Whose car that is?]
3. [Whose shoes are these?|Whose shoes these are?]
explanationZhTw: Whose + 名詞 + Be動詞 + 指示代名詞。
explanationZhCn: Whose + 名词 + Be动词 + 指示代名词。

title: Want?
content:
1. [Which one do you want?|Which one you want?]
2. [Which color is best?|Which color best is?]
3. [Which way is north?|Which way north is?]
explanationZhTw: Which ... 之後接助動詞或Be動詞。
explanationEnUs: Follow Which ... with Aux or Be verb.
explanationZhCn: Which ... 之后接助动词或Be动词。

title: It?
content:
1. [How much is it?|How much it is?]
2. [How much water do we need?|How much water we need?]
3. [How much does it cost?|How much it costs?]
explanationZhTw: How much 用於不可數或詢問價格，需倒裝。
explanationZhCn: How much 用于不可数或询问价格，需倒装。

title: Late?
content:
1. [Am I late?|I am late?]
2. [Am I right?|I am right?]
3. [Am I dreaming?|I am dreaming?]
explanationZhTw: Am 移到主詞 I 前面。
explanationZhCn: Am 移到主词 I 前面。

title: Yet?
content:
1. [Are we there yet?|We are there yet?]
2. [Are we friends?|We are friends?]
3. [Are we safe?|We are safe?]
explanationZhTw: Are 移到 We 前面。
explanationZhCn: Are 移到 We 前面。

title: Sister?
content:
1. [Is she your sister?|She is your sister?]
2. [Is she coming?|She is coming?]
3. [Is she nice?|She is nice?]
explanationZhTw: Is 移到 She 前面。
explanationZhCn: Is 移到 She 前面。

title: Working?
content:
1. [Is he working?|He is working?]
2. [Is he busy?|He is busy?]
3. [Is he taller?|He is taller?]
explanationZhTw: Is 移到 He 前面。
explanationZhCn: Is 移到 He 前面。

title: Sleeping?
content:
1. [Are they sleeping?|They are sleeping?]
2. [Are they open?|They are open?]
3. [Are they yours?|They are yours?]
explanationZhTw: Are 移到 They 前面。
explanationZhCn: Are 移到 They 前面。

title: You?
content:
1. [Do I know you?|I know you?]
2. [Do I look okay?|I look okay?]
3. [Do I need this?|I need this?]
explanationZhTw: 第一人稱疑問句加 Do。
explanationZhCn: 第一人称疑问句加 Do。

title: Milk?
content:
1. [Do we have milk?|We have milk?]
2. [Do we turn left?|We turn left?]
3. [Do we pay here?|We pay here?]
explanationZhTw: 第一人稱複數加 Do。
explanationZhCn: 第一人称复数加 Do。

title: Meat?
content:
1. [Do they eat meat?|They eat meat?]
2. [Do they live here?|They live here?]
3. [Do they understand?|They understand?]
explanationZhTw: 第三人稱複數加 Do。
explanationZhCn: 第三人称复数加 Do。

title: Bite?
content:
1. [Does the dog bite?|The dog bites?]
2. [Does the car run?|The car runs?]
3. [Does the sun shine?|The sun shines?]
explanationZhTw: 單數名詞加 Does，動詞還原。
explanationEnUs: Singular noun uses 'Does', verb base form.
explanationZhCn: 单数名词加 Does，动词还圆。

title: You?
content:
1. [May I help you?|I may help you?]
2. [May I leave?|I may leave?]
3. [May I sit?|I may sit?]
explanationZhTw: May 是請求許可，移到句首。
explanationZhCn: May 是请求许可，移到句首。

title: Wait?
content:
1. [Must we wait?|We must wait?]
2. [Must I go?|I must go?]
3. [Must they pay?|They must pay?]
explanationZhTw: Must (必須) 移到句首。
explanationZhCn: Must (必须) 移到句首。

title: Help?
content:
1. [Could you help?|You could help?]
2. [Could I try?|I could try?]
3. [Could he hear?|He could hear?]
explanationZhTw: Could (Can的过去式或委婉用法) 移到句首。
explanationZhCn: Could (Can的过去式或委婉用法) 移到句首。

title: Tea?
content:
1. [Would you like tea?|You would like tea?]
2. [Would they mind?|They would mind?]
3. [Would it be okay?|It would be okay?]
explanationZhTw: Would 移到句首。
explanationZhCn: Would 移到句首。

title: Cold?
content:
1. [Isn't it cold?|It isn't cold?]
2. [Aren't you tired?|You aren't tired?]
3. [Doesn't he know?|He doesn't know?]
explanationZhTw: 否定疑問句 (Isn't, Aren't, Doesn't) 放句首表確認。
explanationZhCn: 否定疑问句 (Isn't, Aren't, Doesn't) 放句首表确认。

title: It?
content:
1. [How far is it?|How far it is?]
2. [How far can you run?|How far you can run?]
3. [How far did they go?|How far they went?]
explanationZhTw: How far 詢問距離，需倒裝。
explanationZhCn: How far 询问距离，需倒装。

title: Class?
content:
1. [How long is the class?|How long the class is?]
2. [How long have you waited?|How long you have waited?]
3. [How long does it take?|How long it takes?]
explanationZhTw: How long 詢問時間長度，需倒裝。
explanationZhCn: How long 询问时间长度，需倒装。

title: Exercise?
content:
1. [How often do you exercise?|How often you exercise?]
2. [How often does it rain?|How often it rains?]
3. [How often are they late?|How often they are late?]
explanationZhTw: How often 詢問頻率，需倒裝。
explanationZhCn: How often 询问频率，需倒装。

title: We?
content:
1. [Where are we?|We are where?]
2. [Is it okay?|It is okay?]
3. [Do you understand?|You understand?]
explanationZhTw: 總複習：記得將助動詞或Be動詞移到句首。
explanationEnUs: Review: Remember to move Aux/Be to front.
explanationZhCn: 总复习：记得将助动词或Be动词移到句首。
